name: Surreal Deal [Demo]
description:
Surreal Deal is a story about a pretty regular and boring salesman, working a pretty crazy and unpredictable job, with a kinda regular and somewhat unpredictable boss. Join Al in his everyday life, as he deals with customers from another dimension!

WARNING! This game contains flashing images and loud noises! Characters mention violence and consume tobacco onscreen. We discourage you from smoking.

This is a short demo, showcasing 2 workdays of the full week-and-a-half we're planning to make. Follow our project development on twitter! 

Soundtrack can be found here!

Although the demo is small ( one playthrough will take you around 20 minutes) the main feature is its repeatability! There are only two major endings, but you can get there in several different ways. Some changes are small, but...

Developers:

Tanoyu - writing, digital art and programming 

SunMelt  - writing, pixel art, music and sound design

We hope you enjoy the demo!
